snippet: Klara Zakopalova won her third W.T.A. singles title, beating Garbine Muguruza in the Brazil Cup final in Florianopolis.
lead_paragraph: Klara Zakopalova won her third W.T.A. singles title, beating Garbine Muguruza in the Brazil Cup final in Florianopolis.

headline.print_headline: Zakopalova triumphs Klara Zakopalova won her third W.T.A. singles title, beating Garbine Muguruza, 4-6, 7-5, 6-0, in the Brazil Cup final in Florianopolis. The 32nd-ranked Zakopalova won 11 straight games to win the match in 2 hours 12 minutes, securing her first trophy since 2005.
